item.title: Morgan Stanley says humanoid robots will be a $5 trillion market by 2050. How to play it
item.description: "With enthusiastic backing from enterprises, investors and governments, the humanoid space is evolving rapidly," analysts said.

item.title: Charts point to a bullish set-up on Apple ahead of earnings
item.description: Todd Gordon breaks down the charts on the iPhone juggernaut.

item.title: History of market volatility spikes shows S&P 500 should be higher a year after this turmoil
item.description: If history is any indication, investors could win big by this time next year, Wells Fargo Investment Institute found.

item.title: Bank of America says this oil giant can jump more than 20%
item.description: Diamondback Energy is both a defensive and value play in the oil sector, per Bank of America.

item.title: JPMorgan becomes optimistic on this chipmaker, says shares can rally 25%
item.description: JPMorgan reinstated an overweight rating on Qualcomm shares.
